content:
From: Gergely Buday <gbuday@gmail.com>
Hi,

as I understand, old versions of Isabelle are available only as
sources. I have been looking for a description on how to do this but I
could not find neither in the mailing list archive nor in the system
manual. How can I compile it, including Isabelle/Jedit? I need this to
work with Nominal Isabelle which seems to not work with Isabelle 2014.

  • Gergely

From: Alfio Martini <alfio.martini@acm.org>
Hi Gergely,

Past releases are available here:

http://isabelle.in.tum.de/download_past.html

Best

From: Christian Urban <christian.urban@kcl.ac.uk>
Hi Gergely,

I have updated the Nominal tar-bundles for Isabelle 2014
on the webpage. Sorry about doing this so late. Hope
this solves some problems.

Christian
